flow.prompt: Hey! I’m FroBot — your Personal AI Business Builder. We’re about to create your logo, website, app, brand kit and strategy. What’s the name of your business?
Great name. In one simple sentence, what does your business do?
Got it. Which industry does this fit best? For example: Beauty, Fitness, Real Estate, Trucking, Retail, Services, Parenting, Finance, or Other.
Nice. What overall vibe do you want your brand to give off: Luxury, Energetic, Trustworthy, Friendly, Elegant, or Organic?
Let’s design your logo. Do you want: Icon-only, Text-only, or Icon + Text hybrid?
Logo preferences saved. What’s the main job of your website: Book clients, Sell products, Show information, Collect leads, or Build your brand?
Locked. What’s the #1 purpose of your mobile app: Booking, Messaging, Content Hub, Tracking, Community, Dashboard, or Store?
Perfect. I’ll use all of this to build your app screens and flow. Now I’ll generate your brand kit — colors, fonts, voice, and taglines.
Brand kit is ready. Do you want me to also create a complete Business Strategy Plan for $100? It includes your launch plan, pricing and marketing blueprint.
Great. Let’s pick how you want to pay for your Business-In-A-Box: $5,000 in full, $1,000 down, or $500 down.
Once payment is complete, I’ll generate your ZIP with logo kit, website, app, brand kit, marketing pack, and instructions.
